short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make markdown notes tied to URL patterns and other helpful tools.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Page notes provides a markdown editor in the side panel that can be opened by URL or searching for one. This is a great place to take notes for all kinds of reasons. The other feature it provides is a "clipbox" where you can store items to copy when you enter a keyboard shortcut. It is like having a few additional clipboards. There are also a few developer tools that require your browser's developer mode to be active.
